name: tunarr
tagline: A pseudo live TV channel generator for media libraries
description: Tunarr is a self-hosted pseudo-live TV channel generator that creates custom channels from Plex or Jellyfin libraries and streams them as continuous linear feeds.

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Create custom TV channels from your Plex or Jellyfin media libraries

features.title: Continuous Streaming
features.description: Generate linear TV feeds that play continuously like traditional broadcast channels

features.title: Schedule Programming
features.description: Build channel schedules with specific shows, movies, or content blocks

features.title: Theme Customization
features.description: Create multiple channels for different genres, themes, or family members

features.title: Commercial Breaks
features.description: Insert custom content or filler between programs for authentic TV experience

features.title: Random Playback
features.description: Shuffle content within time slots for variety while maintaining schedule structure

features.title: Epg Generation
features.description: Generate electronic program guides for compatible TV apps and clients

features.title: Media Server Integration
features.description: Pull content directly from Plex or Jellyfin without duplicating files
